oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Leila Shute Tigert and Mary Rhea Cooper feeding a lamb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Leila Shute Tigert and daughter Mary Rhea Cooper bottle feed a lamb in front of a wooden fence. Mary extends her hand out in front of another sheep to her left.

Mary Rhea Cooper (1911-1938) was the daughter of Amelia Townsend Tigert (1891-1928) and Ernest Bonner Cooper (1869-1951). Dr. Holland Tigert and Leila Shute Tigert, her mother's uncle and aunt, adopted Mary sometime after her parents divorced. Mary lived at Grassmere with the Tigerts until her death.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Women; Girls; Sheep;
